content:
New Balance and Brooks are both excellent choices for comfortable and supportive walking shoes.

Yes, both brands offer online tools to help you determine your correct size. Here's what you can do:

**New Balance:**

1. **Size Chart:** New Balance provides a detailed size chart on their website. You can measure your foot length and width to determine your corresponding size.
2. **Fit Finder:** New Balance offers a Fit Finder tool on their website. You'll need to input your foot length, width, and preferred fit (e.g., narrow, medium, wide). The tool will then recommend a size based on your inputs.
3. **Virtual Try-On:** Some New Balance styles are eligible for Virtual Try-On. You can upload a photo of your foot, and the tool will superimpose the shoe on your foot to give you an idea of the fit.

**Brooks:**

1. **Size Chart:** Brooks also provides a size chart on their website. Measure your foot length and width to determine your corresponding size.
2. **Brooks Fit Finder:** Brooks offers a Fit Finder tool that asks for your foot length, width, and preferred fit. The tool will then recommend a size based on your inputs.
3. **Run Signature:** Brooks has a Run Signature tool that analyzes your foot shape, stride, and running style (even if you're just walking!) to recommend the best shoe for you. While it's primarily designed for runners, it can still help you find a comfortable walking shoe.

**Additional Tips:**

1. **Measure your feet:** Take the time to measure your feet in the afternoon, as they tend to swell slightly throughout the day.
2. **Consider your socks:** If you plan to wear thicker socks, you may want to size up slightly.
3. **Check the return policy:** Both New Balance and Brooks offer returns or exchanges if the shoes don't fit comfortably.

By using these online tools, you'll be able to get a better sense of your size and find the perfect fit for your new walking shoes!
